text: Andrei and Serge are talking about filming equipment for a movie shoot. Andrei asks Serge if he has retrieved the equipment, and Serge responds that he is currently doing so. Andrei suggests that Serge should bring his credit card with him, as they have an overdue bill to pay to a company. Serge agrees and says that there is not much credit available on the card, but he will let Andrei know if it works. Andrei thanks him and says that the company will be happy to pay once the bill is settled. Serge says he will let Andrei know if it works.
